website_summaries.verdict: The pole on this model extends 8.3 feet, offering good reach on a pole saw designed for moderate household use.
pros: The 24-volt motor is powerful enough for the small landscaping and wood cutting tasks of most households
It includes the popular easy-tightening and auto-oiling features available on most Greenworks models, making this unit both easy to use and durable enough to stand up to moderate use
cons: This model isn't designed for frequent use or especially large jobs, and it may wear out more quickly in a household with such demanding cutting needs

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FOR A SPECIFIC PURPOSE
customer_reviews.text: Want to trim a few branches ? Half a dozen? Then this is great. Really great. Easy to use, not too heavy. Quick jobs 20 minutes - great. If you want to do more, then this is not the right tool. This will not cut for an hour, probably not 30 minutes. I cut about eight branches big as my arm. It was done. I am "OK" with that. Far less hassle than cranking a gas chain saw. Convenient. There are times when this is the right tool. If it had a stronger battery I would have given it a FIVE STAR. I definitely have more powerful lithium battery tools. Perfect for hitting my palm tree now and then.
customer_reviews.author: P. L. Watkins

customer_reviews.title: great product but weak consumer
customer_reviews.text: really liked it but was just too heavy for me. plus the limbs i needed to reach had to use ladder for.
customer_reviews.author: carolina girl

customer_reviews.title: This works far better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This works far better than expected. I was kind of afraid that a battery-operated saw would be under-powered and wouldn't cut very well, but after using it to trim all of the branches on my new property with a single charge, I love this thing. It's light, and doesn't cause excess fatigue. I bought a chainsaw at the same time, and I find myself choosing to pick this up again and again to make a quick cut.
customer_reviews.author: Darran

customer_reviews.title: GreenWorks makes great products. I have cut very large logs for ...
customer_reviews.text: GreenWorks makes great products. I have cut very large logs for my fire place. The battery lasts for about 30 - 45 minutes. This is much quitter than a gas powered chainsaw. For the small cutting jobs I do at my house, this item is perfect. I have also purchased a GreenWorks extended trimmer, and a blower. All work off the same batter 24V lithium battery which is very convenient. I will likely buy another 24v battery in the future and possibly the chainsaw. However the chainsaw is 40V. Although this product is made in China, it has worked very well for me. Easy to assemble and received quickly. Too bad this is not a made in the USA company.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Chops a tree down with one charge!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned this saw for a year and a half. It’s great! Super easy to use and maintain. Not too heavy so it makes it easy to control when cutting higher branches. Gone are the days of climbing up and hacking them off with a hand saw. Today, I dropped the battery in it and cut down a big manzanita tree, all the branches and the trunk !! The truck was probably 8-10 inches thick. All on one charge! Amazing product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tool
customer_reviews.text: Holy Moly. This is the tool I've needed for years but was always hesitant to buy. My biggest concern was the battery life not lasting, so each job would be start and stop, or require 5 batteries to get through. Not the case. A 3 hour job took me 15 minutes, which left me hours to go on the battery life. I decided to keep cutting to see how long the battery would last - and it turned out a lot longer than me. This is the closest thing we have to a light saber so far.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent tool for its purpose. I have a regular chainsaw for normal use but trimming limbs is very easy now without dragging out the other saw. Battery life is more than expected. I've never used it more than 45 minutes at a time and didn't run down.I was very skeptical when shopping but for the price I knew if it didn't work well I wasn't losing a lot. I was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Windsor Poff

customer_reviews.title: Don’t trust in the second hand “with cosmetic problems” only
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item second hand “like new, only with cosmetic things” (that’s how they described on Amazon) used once and didn’t work anymore. When I opened to check, a metal plate that holds the motor was broken in both attaching points. So, what should i do now?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great runtime
customer_reviews.text: It has a good runtime, charges fast, and really works. At first you have to keep adjusting the tension on the chain, and the instructions aren't exactly clear, but it is easy to figure out. I was skeptical a battery pole saw would work well and for so long, but I only needed to trim two trees. Now that I've used it, I use it on everything.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Tanzer

customer_reviews.title: Great Battery Pole Chain Saw!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great pole chain saw!!! Angled right for removing limbs well above your head and the battery has lasted through every one of my uses. Cutting limbs up to 5" with no problems whatsoever. It will take up room in the garage as it doesn't telescope in and out, but you can remove the extension section to solve this problem.
customer_reviews.author: B Lee Thomasson Jr

customer_reviews.title: A cut above
customer_reviews.text: Works very nicely to trim branches. Sure faster and easier than using my pole saw. Quiet and easy to use. Because it comes apart into 3 sections you can easily transport and store it in a smaller space than a pole saw. The bar and chain oil tank has a sight window making it easy to monitor the level.
customer_reviews.author: Bigfoot

customer_reviews.title: REALLY POWERFUL FOR SUCH A SMALL CHAINSAW
customer_reviews.text: VERY EASY TO USE ,EASY TO ASSEMBLE , VERY POWERFUL. I CUT AN 8"BRANCH WITH POLE FULLY EXTENDED IT CUT WITH EASE TOOK ABOUT 3-4 MINUTES AND STILL HAD PLENTY OF BATTERY LIFE LEFTOVER. CHAIN OIL WEEPS OUT IF SAW IS STORED HANGING UP RIGHT, BUT NO PROBLEM IF STORED HORIZONTALLY. I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS SAW TO ANYONE FOR AROUND THE YARD FOR PRUNING .WORKS GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: EDGAR DAVIGNON

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would use anything but a gas chainsaw but this electric saw exceeded my expectations. Chain is very sharp and it cuts through limbs with ease. Very easy to operate, lightweight and very handy trimming limbs up on the tree.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: seems to work like it's supposed to but a little weak
customer_reviews.text: make sure your battery fits this unit. seems to work like it's supposed to but a little weak. Great tool for small to medium size branches. at full extension, the joints seem a little weak.
customer_reviews.author: Gorgeous Georgeous

customer_reviews.title: REALLY REALLY CUTS WELL...
customer_reviews.text: CUTS REALLY WELL, FAST CUTTING THROUGH ANY WOOD, BATTERY LAST A GOOD LONG WHILE...IT IS HEAVY WHEN YOU TRY TO REACH OR EXTEND YOUR ARMS...BUT SO EASY AND HANDY TO USE IT IS WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.author: MR. J1S

customer_reviews.title: The Greenworks Cordless Pole Saw is Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Greenworks pole saw it is great. I love Greenworks products all in all. The pole saw is lightweight and really trims the branches from trees and bushes. I love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Seidel

customer_reviews.title: I have been able to make a great difference in the appearance of the back yard
customer_reviews.text: So far, this is exactly what I wanted. The charge lasts about as long as my arms do. I have been able to make a great difference in the appearance of the back yard, and mowing is so much easier! It's actually fun to use this thing.
customer_reviews.author: martyks

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It works well I have several green works tools so I bought this pole saw as well. Battery seemed to last awhile it did all the cutting I needed to do, on one battery.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: I am 82 yrs young. A lot of pole saws are to heavy for me to use. This one I can reach about 12 ft up and still hold not top heavy
customer_reviews.author: DAVID BOYER

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for trimming lilacs!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my overgrown lilacs. I'm 52 y/o woman. It is a little bit heavy but I removed the middle extension pole which made it lighter. I'm so happy that I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: RDT

customer_reviews.title: This was and is the best tool. At first I thought I would not ...
customer_reviews.text: This was and is the best tool. At first I thought I would not be able to cut the tree limbs hanging over my roof but the extension allowed me to cut them with ease and I am only 5"1
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte Echave

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and oil disposal
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty awkward for me. Also doesn’t say you need to change out oil so if you are like me and wanted to stay away from oil and having to dispose of don’t get this.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Ann Olson

customer_reviews.title: cuts quickly
customer_reviews.text: Fast cutting, battery life is yet to be seen, only used once. Chain ,like all chain saws, has to be tightened often.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Jacques

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: For residential use, I find that greenworks products are very good and do what they are supposed to do. This is my second greenworks product. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby C

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing!! Kind of light weight but not so much. Still easy to handle. Didn't come with extra chain like description said. Thata why I only gave 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy B.

customer_reviews.title: 3 middle aged women woodcutters love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a greenworks weed eater I used for years so when my tree split I figured it was worth a try. I bought the pole saw and chain saw. Got them the next day opened the box and only had to put the poles together and charge the battery. The next day in an hour the tree branches and large split branch were down and chopped up at the curb.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Haher

customer_reviews.title: We have the Greenworks line lawn equipment and found them ...
customer_reviews.text: We have the Greenworks line lawn equipment and found them all to be high quality products with battery life that works for us.
customer_reviews.author: Sprucerocks

customer_reviews.title: Another AWESOME product!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it promises to do! I have become the envy of the neighborhood. We also own the chainsaw and weed-eater. GREAT PRODUCTS!
customer_reviews.author: TCDSoCal

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. I’m surprised at how long the charge lasts. I kind of thought Green Works did not build a solid product but I’m happy to say I was wrong. Now I own multiple green works tools
customer_reviews.author: al

customer_reviews.title: Works better on thicker branches
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product! It’s great for bigger branches and not so much the skinny ones. Be sure to order the oil that goes in the reservoir when you purchase this. I used vegetable oil. 😂
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Hamm

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: 74 old and I like this. Scary at first but easy to use, Deducted one star because oil leaks out. But good for price.
customer_reviews.author: lea

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: With the low price I was not expecting much, but was pleasantly surprised. It is a great tool for me to clear shooting lanes for hunting and really works great...
customer_reviews.author: Bill Smith

customer_reviews.title: It cuts nice.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I was impressed by this! Just make sure to put in some chain/bar oil in before you start cutting. It cuts nice.
customer_reviews.author: Scott F. Jones

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I am quite happy with how the product works, however the only downfall I have it the span your arms have to be from the handle to the stem to be able to control while using. I have very good upper body strength so I didn't have much of an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Great tool if you needs to trim some tree branches.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm, took down a tree branch that is thicker than a reciprocal saw can handle. Easy to set up and it is one of my favorite in my tools collection.
customer_reviews.author: Henry C

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant on buying a battery powered chain saw, but this is amazing! Battery lasts much longer than expected. Plenty of power to trim up those hard to reach branches.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great saw
customer_reviews.text: Just a little heavy for an old lady but a great saw
customer_reviews.author: skate girl 001

customer_reviews.title: pole trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Amazing - I love it - I have a larger gas powered pole trimmer for bigger jobs - but this is all I need for most of my tree trimming on my property and it is much lighter and easier to use
customer_reviews.author: DAVID D JONES

customer_reviews.title: Power and ease!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I have ever made. I have used it at least once every 3 days. The extension is easy to add/subtract and it is easy to use because it it lightweight (I am a 57 year old female). I rarely write reviews but felt that this polesaw earned it!!!! I actually look for limbs And small trees to take down because it is FUN to use.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Kutcher

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about a battery operated chain saw, but this thing really has its uses.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice pole saw with 24V battery & charger
customer_reviews.text: New in packaging. Works great. Make sure to buy some bar and chain oil at your local hardware place or order it before use.
customer_reviews.author: H. T. Davis

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: im a 54 year old woman, I love it, it worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: gizmo

customer_reviews.title: Money saver
customer_reviews.text: Arborist was charging me $150 to trim 3 branches from one tree. Did it myself easy. Even though it's lightweight, I still can't use it with my arms fully extended over my head but it made easy work of lower branches
customer_reviews.author: JSdoc

customer_reviews.title: Can't Beat for the Money
customer_reviews.text: This works very nice both with and without extension. It was a little heavier than I was led to believe from other reviews but still very manageable.
customer_reviews.author: GFenster

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! Worked way better than I expected. Good battery charge, easily cut everything I needed in the first charge. My only complaint, if you could call it that, is that I didn't realize it would not arrive with (even a starter bottle) of the necessary bar oil for the chain. So I had to buy that separately.
customer_reviews.author: tracey

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This pole saw works great especially with the angled head
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it matched my 24 volt tools from greenworks
customer_reviews.text: I found that it cut better than the other one I had before
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with Tension Adjustment
customer_reviews.text: Works well for limbs and small trees. A month ago chain started coming off. Only had it for seven months. The tension screw will not turn at all. Disappointed. I have the larger 40 v Greenworks 10 inch. The tension mechanism works much better.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Batteries stop holding charge after a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: Less than a month after purchasing the battery stopped charging. Called customer service and they sent me a new battery free of charge. That battery stopped working two weeks later. I guess the term “free of charge” had a double meaning.
customer_reviews.author: theslowblade

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Bit heavy, but does the job well. I like it. Recommend for men, I think some women can handle it as well.
customer_reviews.author: A.B.

customer_reviews.title: Best around for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Very Powerful and well made Battery life seems good so far..
customer_reviews.author: George Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Used item
customer_reviews.text: It has been used and broken. Can’t even plug in my greenwork batteries
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Did the job effortlessly
customer_reviews.text: This modestly price pole saw took down all of my branches needing trimming with no problem on one charge. One of those purchases you wished you made 10 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Sundance

customer_reviews.title: Above expectations
customer_reviews.text: Real nice saw, this little saw cuts very good and quick! It does not come with bar and chain oil, so make sure to oil it before you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Vahl

customer_reviews.title: little powerhouse
customer_reviews.text: works better than i imagined. battery life better than i thought. bought for my wife who is small. she handles ut with ease. love greenworks never let me down.
customer_reviews.author: t.j

customer_reviews.title: ... used it once and it cut through 5inch branches like cutting through butter
customer_reviews.text: only used it once and it cut through 5inch branches like cutting through butter.hope it continues like that.
customer_reviews.author: roger brandt

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Pros: lightweight and easy to use. Cons: storage is a little tricky, the saw comes apart in sections but the top section (with the blade) is relatively long and must to stored horizontally or else the bar oil will leak out. In fact, it must be propped up against something to keep it upright because of this. The cut itself is a little rougher than I expected as well. The neon green makes it look like a toy, but that is just a matter of aesthetics, I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Parsons III

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Product performs as advertised and has exceeded my expectations. Holds a good charge. The bigger the log just slow your roll and it can handle the cut. I will let you know how it works after the first year of use.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Binns

customer_reviews.title: Had to return it because it was too heavy for ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it because it was too heavy for me. Seems a well made machine for someone stronger than I.
customer_reviews.author: Deana D Steven

customer_reviews.title: He is very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Cordless Pole Saw for my husband. I grow tired of watching him stretching to cut the tree branches. He is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: judahgirl

customer_reviews.title: Much less expensive than found locally..
customer_reviews.text: Used this for cutting branches from tall Mesquite trees--it was light-weight and easy to use (for n 82 yr. old man) and much less expensive than found in local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Inorio

customer_reviews.title: Easy to work with
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a new toy now. He loves this saw. It works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Product exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Once you start pruning your branches you might not stop. Works beautifully. Easy to use. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: We have 33 acres. Works great for cutting small limbs so that I can cut grass with tractor
customer_reviews.author: susan kuhlmann

customer_reviews.title: the saw is great,cut the bracnhes on the trees good.
customer_reviews.text: one of the poles are slightly heavy,but make due because the saw is great.
customer_reviews.author: annette livingston/none@ this time(thanks).

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: A good tool for simple pruning high up. Not very good on larger limbs (>3 inches).
customer_reviews.author: David J. Zelinger

customer_reviews.title: works great all my friends are impressed how it works so ...
customer_reviews.text: works great all my friends are impressed how it works so am I would highly recommend just keep an eye on oil a lot of cuts per charge
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this to cut limbs up high on a tree without needing a ladder.
customer_reviews.author: coleen brunk

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the money!, have used it several times to trim trees in my front and backyard, powerful and easy to use!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris.S

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it can be easily handled.
customer_reviews.text: Not very hands-on for an older woman to use. Awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for cutting down Redwood trees, but perfect for its intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, high quality saw for normal tree trimming/maintenance around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Fashion11

customer_reviews.title: Awful! Didn't come with the middle pole and no ...
customer_reviews.text: Awful! Didn't come with the middle pole and no retention screw. Now I have the hassle of sending this back.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M.

customer_reviews.title: This item met expectations
customer_reviews.text: I like not having to deal with a power cord or gas. It is also lighter than the gas powered saw. It would be nice if it came with an extra battery.
customer_reviews.author: WC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for trimming around the house and backyard with decent battery life to last 30 cuts.
customer_reviews.author: Jian Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Just a little heavier then I expected when fully extended. Otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Dujardin

customer_reviews.title: but it is easy to do right in the field
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to cut down a few small trees and several limbs with this saw. I was able to do two dozen small trees and then cut them up. For the money it has exceeded my expectations. The chain has needed adjustments, but it is easy to do right in the field! I am over 60 years old and so happy it was light enough to allow me to do the work myself.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: works great, just took a while to get here
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed , works great ,just took a while to get here !
customer_reviews.author: Tyler H.

customer_reviews.title: There are three different 24 V batteries for greenworks tools ...
customer_reviews.text: There are three different 24 V batteries for greenworks tools. make sure you get the matching one I had to send my new pole saw back because the batteries I had don't fit it
customer_reviews.author: Tim Steinback

customer_reviews.title: I expected this saw to be great. I'm cutting 2 inch ficus hedges and it's ...
customer_reviews.text: I expected this saw to be great. I'm cutting 2 inch ficus hedges and it's taking forever. I tried a 4 inch branch and just gave up. Not sure if something is wrong as it seems to be running fine but the chain doesn't really eat anything up like other saws I've used. Gonna try to return.
customer_reviews.author: Adam L. Beer

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. Cuts great
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. Cuts great. Battery lasts a long time. I give it 4 stars instead of 5 because when you have the extension pole attachment on, it's a little top heavy and harder to balance when you're trying to reach higher branches.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ruff

customer_reviews.title: great product that performs as promised
customer_reviews.text: Works well...might want to consider a longer chain than this one's 8" blade. Limits its use to branches under 5-6 inches. Performs extremely well. Well Balanced. Battery time is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Turtle

customer_reviews.title: Pole saw was balanced and easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok. Pole saw was balanced and easy to operate. Battery life was exceptable.
customer_reviews.author: C. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: good tool
customer_reviews.text: This tool was great on large branches, but not very good on small things like bushes. I do like the tool over all and would support anyone purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase. Only thing keeping it from 5 stars ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase. Only thing keeping it from 5 stars is weight using the fully extended pole. Shorter than was expecting but with full extension for me as a 5 foot woman, the balance of using the trigger and holding it upright was difficult to manage. Good thing I purchased it for my husband. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Wiest

customer_reviews.title: Charge doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: The charge doesn't last very long and it's not very powerful. Really only good to clean up grass clippings after mowing the lawn. But it's very inexpensive so you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Constance O. Horattas

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited when this saw arrived. Unfortunately it broke withing 5 minutes of cutting. The limb was maybe 2 inches. No way could this thing ever be handy for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: MommaE

customer_reviews.title: Makes sure you have the correct battery before ordering.
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS FOR USE WITH A 24V. NEVER GOT TO USE IT.yeah, i know it's clearly stated. Wish companies didn't have so many different batteries. Will not fit the newer 40v G-Max batteries.
customer_reviews.author: LC23

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: too long when connected two pole together...should made it small pole when cutting small tree!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great trimmer
customer_reviews.text: the only thing I disliked is that when the longest extension is added to the pole, I cannot comfortably use. other than that I really liked
customer_reviews.author: SharonS

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift, not sure how it works but looking forward to trying it out in the spring!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Cherry

product_meta.title: Greenworks 8.3' 24V Cordless Pole Saw, 2.0 AH Battery Included 20352
product_meta.description: Size:2Ah Battery| Style:Old ModelGreenWorks G-24 System offers versatility with a range of tools to choose from to get the job done with outdoor and indoor tools for all your DIY Projects. Whether it is getting the deck completed or getting your yard in pristine shape, the G-24 System has a tool for every project. From trimmers, chainsaw, pole saw and sweepers to drills, compressors and handheld circular saws, this system is quickly becoming the most versatile system for the suburban home. Compatible Battery and Charger Models include, Model 29842 and 29862. All GreenWorks Tools are backed with a 4 year warranty, the lithium-ion batteries are backed with a 2 year warranty. GreenWorks 20352 G24 Lithium-ion Cordless 8 inch Bar and Chain Pole Saw includes 2.0Ah Battery and Charger.
feature_bullets: 24V Lithium-Ion Battery compatible with both indoor and outdoor tools--includes 2Ah Battery and Charger
8-Inch bar and chain for easy trimming of branches
Easy adjust chain tensioning system for quick tightening of the chain
Automatic oiler applies oil to the bar and chain to ensure durability and extend the life of the chain
3-piece aluminum shaft can be extended to 8 ft. for the perfect extended

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars234 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
